name: Monday Latin Nights with Latin Grooves and Dancing
description:
Hola mis amores!
Tenemos una maravillosa noticia 
You dreamed of a conversation table?? Well we offer you an immersive experience to listen and practice (and even dance) your best Spanish and Portuguese language skills in our living room.
Every Monday, we will welcome 2 Latin bands - one for dinner, one to make you dance with Latin grooves.
